model

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, PCExpression

    public class Rule
extends Object
implements PCExpression, Cloneable
    This class represents the rules of the table of truth.
    Author:
    Alexandre Camus

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Goal body 
      private SimpleSentence head 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rule(SimpleSentence head)
      Constructor of the class in case of a simple fact.
      Rule(SimpleSentence head, Goal body)
      Constructor of the class in case of a backtracking rule.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rule

        public Rule(SimpleSentence head)
        Constructor of the class in case of a simple fact.
        Parameters:
        head - the fact that is declared true.

      • Rule

        public Rule(SimpleSentence head,
    Goal body)
        Constructor of the class in case of a backtracking rule.
        Parameters:
        head - the element that is defined by the rule.
        body - the definition of the element.

    • Method Detail

      • getHead

        public SimpleSentence getHead()
        Gets the head of the rule. The head is either the fact that is declared as true or the element that is defined.
        Returns:
        a SimpleSentence object which is the head of the rule.

      • getBody

        public Goal getBody()
        Gets the body of the rule. The body is either null for a fact or a clause for a complete rule.
        Returns:
        a Goal object representing the body.

      • replaceVariables

        public Rule replaceVariables(SubstitutionSet s)
        Replaces all the variables in the rule according to the specified bindings.

        This method is recursive over all PCExpression implementations.

        Specified by:
        replaceVariables in interface PCExpression
        Parameters:
        s - the SubstitutionSet that contains the bindings of the variables so far.
        Returns:
        a Rule object representing the bound rule.
        See Also:
        PCExpression.replaceVariables(model.SubstitutionSet)

      • standardizeVariablesApart

        public Rule standardizeVariablesApart(Hashtable<Variable,Variable> newVars)
        Standardizes the variables in order to be sure that there won't be any variable clashes.

        This method is recursive over all PCExpression implementations.

        Specified by:
        standardizeVariablesApart in interface PCExpression
        Parameters:
        newVars - is a parameter to save over the recursion all the variable replacements done so far.
        Returns:
        a Rule object representing the standardized rule.
        See Also:
        PCExpression.standardizeVariablesApart(java.util.Hashtable)

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns the rule in the form of: "head :- body".
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        See Also:
        Object.toString()
